I plan on having a single skin sparing mastectomy on my left breast and after reconstruction ( expander) my PS will do a lift  and add a implant on my right breast.  I figured that all women have a 12.5 % chance of getting BC ( 1out of every 8 ).  I have a 10% chance for getting bc on the good breast, the way I look at it that I have a better chance of not getting cancer on my good breast then I did of not getting bc at all. I hope & pray that I made the correct decision.. if not I will face whatever i need to ... DOWN THE ROAD. Thanks for all of your help!
